name: ICONIC HELICOPTERS PTY LTD
about: ICONIC HELICOPTERS PTY LTD is a premier flying school and aviation services provider based in Catherine Field, New South Wales. We specialize in personalized pilot training, utilizing the world's safest and most modern 2-seat helicopter, the Cabri G2. Our training programs cater to both recreational and career-oriented pilots. In addition to flight training, we offer tailored corporate transfers, airwork services, and comprehensive maintenance and sales support. Our commitment to safety, modern equipment, and client satisfaction sets us apart in the aviation industry. We are dedicated to helping our clients achieve their aviation goals with excellence and professionalism.
